summary: Adds a spell that works like a Philter of the Phantom. Makes the caster look like a ghost.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a spell that works like a Philter of the Phantom. Makes the caster look like a ghost.

The Spell Tome can be found in the satchel by Wyndelius Gatharian in Shroud Hearth Barrow.

Currently the Spell makes you transparent, but doesn\'t have the blue-ish green glow yet.

Ghost Walk :

School: Alteration
Level: Adept
Duration: 5 min
Cost: 85 


BUGS:

*Sometimes when you cast it, it lasts longer than expected.
*Randomly the spell looks exactly like the Philter of the Phantom, other times its just transparent.
author: daimonwng0
